name: Wellcare
tagline: The most TRUSTED telemedicine and wellness platform
description:
Wellcare offers telemedicine, mental health and wellness services to individuals and corporate employees. Now patients, even in rural areas, are able to access to reputable doctors and psychologists by phone and video 24/7.  

We solve major pain points in Vietnam healthcare: lack of good doctors especially in remote areas, overcrowding in hospitals, misdiagnosis and inappropriate treatment plans that leading to high healthcare cost burden for families and payers. Wellcare is trusted and recognized for quality doctors, simple and logical workflow, and above all whole-hearted, dedicated services.
